content.prompt: A sample of pregnant women is given a high dose of caffeine daily to determine if their babies are born with an addiction to caffeine. Which of the following is an ethical issue in this study?

choices.label: Deception is not allowed in psychological research.
There is possible long-term harm to the babies.
Pregnant women are not a random sample.

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
